summary: Karani Sena Yuva Shakti organization website with home page (hero section with custom circular logo emblem without white background, admin-managed photo gallery, news section), public admission form page (collects candidate name, father's name, address, email, DOB, mobile, and photo; generates unique 10-character ID in format YYYY0-XXXXX; displays printable ID card-sized admission card after submission with all labels in Hindi, styled as a wallet/credit card ~85×54mm with organization branding), and Internet Identity-protected admin panel with sidebar menu navigation and super admin authorization (manage submissions with unique IDs, gallery photos, news posts, and admin users); all public-facing UI text in Hindi (home page, navigation, admission form, buttons, labels, error messages); admin panel remains in English; organization name displayed in Devanagari script as 'करणी सेना युवा शक्ति'
architectural_notes: Using Internet Identity for admin authentication
Backend database for storing admission form submissions
Photo upload functionality for both admissions and gallery
Admin panel for content management (submissions, photos, news)
Super admin system with permanent first-user registration
Multi-admin support with role-based access control
Admin management interface for adding/removing admins
Admin reset functionality for system recovery
Admin panel redesigned with sidebar menu navigation for better organization
Public admission form allows anonymous submissions without authentication

existing_features.title: Create a home page with a hero section displaying the organization logo and name 'Karani Sena Yuva Shakti'
Implement a photo gallery section on the home page that displays multiple photos uploaded by admins
Add an organization news and messages section on the home page that displays posts created by admins
Create an admission form page with fields for: full name, complete address, email, date of birth, and mobile number
Add a photo upload field to the admission form where candidates can upload their own photo
Create an admin panel protected by Internet Identity authentication that allows admins to log in securely
Implement admin functionality to view and manage all admission form submissions in the admin panel
Add admin functionality to upload, view, and delete multiple photos for the home page gallery
Implement admin functionality to create, edit, and delete organization news and message posts

Design the website with a visually cohesive theme using warm, traditional colors (saffron, deep red, gold accents) with clean typography and culturally respectful layout patterns appropriate for a youth organization
Ensure the Admin link appears in the navigation menu on all pages, including the home page, so authenticated users can access the admin panel
Create a 'Manage Admins' section in the admin panel that displays a list of all current admins with their principal IDs, with add and remove functionality
Add a 'Reset Admin System' button in the Manage Admins section that prompts for confirmation before calling the backend reset function
Update the ProtectedRoute component to call backend authorization check instead of always denying access, and handle the super admin initialization flow for first-time access
Restructure the admin panel layout to use a left sidebar navigation menu instead of the current tabbed interface, with menu items for: View Submissions, Manage Gallery, Manage News, and Manage Admins
Fix the authorization issue preventing the super admin from uploading photos to the gallery in the Manage Gallery section of the admin panel

Update the frontend admission form page to include a 'Father's Name' text input field positioned immediately after the 'Full Name' field, with appropriate validation requiring this field to be filled before submission

Create a printable admission card component that displays immediately after successful form submission, showing the candidate's generated unique ID, full name, father's name, date of birth, mobile number, uploaded photo, and submission date in a card-style layout optimized for printing
Update the admin panel's 'View Submissions' section to display the unique admission ID for each candidate submission in the accordion list view
Update the frontend useSubmitAdmissionForm hook to handle anonymous submissions without passing authentication credentials

Verify the complete public admission flow works end-to-end: anonymous visitors access the form, fill it out with all required fields including father's name, submit successfully, and receive their printable admission card with the unique admission ID
Replace all occurrences of 'Karani Sena Yuva Shakti' with the Devanagari script 'करणी सेना युवा शक्ति' in the hero section heading on the home page
Update the HTML document title in frontend/index.html to use 'करणी सेना युवा शक्ति' instead of 'Karani Sena Yuva Shakti Website'

Replace any other references to 'Karani Sena Yuva Shakti' throughout the UI components with 'करणी सेना युवा शक्ति', including the Layout component header/navigation and any other visible text instances

Replace the current logo in the home page hero section with the uploaded circular emblem image (IMG-20260121-WA0003.jpg) featuring 'करणी सेना युवा शक्ति' text in Devanagari script around the top, two deity portraits (Lord Rama and Lord Parshuram), crossed swords, and a central sunrise symbol over water waves with gradient orange-yellow background

Replace the current logo in the home page hero section with the uploaded circular emblem image (IMG-20260121-WA0003-1.jpg) — the version without the white background — featuring 'करणी सेना युवा शक्ति' text in Devanagari script around the top, two deity portraits, crossed swords, and a central sunrise symbol over water waves with gradient orange-yellow background. Save the image as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/logo-emblem.png and render it in the hero section.

Translate all public-facing UI text in the Home page (HomePage.tsx) to Hindi, including the hero section headings, subheadings, call-to-action button labels (e.g., 'Join Now' → 'अभी जुड़ें', 'Learn More' → 'और जानें'), gallery section title, news section title, and any other visible text. Keep the organization name as 'करणी सेना युवा शक्ति' in Devanagari script.

Translate all navigation menu items and header text in the Layout component (Layout.tsx) to Hindi, including links such as 'Home' → 'होम', 'Admission' → 'प्रवेश', and any other public-facing navigation labels. The 'Admin' link for authenticated users may remain in English as it leads to the admin panel.

Translate all text on the Admission Form page (AdmissionFormPage.tsx) to Hindi, including: page title, field labels ('पूरा नाम', 'पिता का नाम', 'पूरा पता', 'ईमेल', 'जन्म तिथि', 'मोबाइल नंबर', 'फोटो अपलोड करें'), placeholder text, validation error messages ('यह फ़ील्ड आवश्यक है', 'कृपया वैध ईमेल दर्ज करें', etc.), and the submit button label ('जमा करें').

Update the AdmissionCard component (AdmissionCard.tsx) so that all labels and text on the printable admission card are in Hindi: 'प्रवेश आईडी', 'नाम', 'पिता का नाम', 'जन्म तिथि', 'मोबाइल नंबर', 'पता', 'जमा करने की तारीख', the card title (e.g., 'प्रवेश पत्र'), and the print button label ('प्रिंट करें'). Organization name remains 'करणी सेना युवा शक्ति'.

Translate any public-facing text in the AccessDeniedScreen component and the GallerySection and NewsSection components to Hindi, including empty-state messages, loading states, and any descriptive text visible to non-admin public users.

Redesign the AdmissionCard component (frontend/src/components/AdmissionCard.tsx) as a compact physical ID card sized layout (~85×54mm / credit card proportions) with the following: organization logo (frontend/public/assets/generated/logo-emblem.png) in the top-left corner, organization name 'करणी सेना युवा शक्ति' as the card header, candidate photo thumbnail on the right side, and the following fields displayed prominently in Hindi labels: प्रवेश आईडी (unique admission ID, styled prominently), नाम (full name), पिता का नाम (father's name), जन्म तिथि (date of birth), मोबाइल नंबर (mobile number). Apply saffron/gold warm theme with deep red accents consistent with the existing site branding. The card must render at fixed credit-card proportions (aspect ratio ~1.586:1) and be print-optimized. Keep the 'प्रिंट करें' print button outside the card area so it does not appear when printing.

In the home page hero section (HomePage.tsx), update the 'प्रवेश के लिए आवेदन करें' (Apply for Admission) call-to-action button to use a distinct, visually contrasting highlight color that makes it stand out prominently from the other buttons and the hero background. The highlight color should complement but contrast clearly with the existing saffron/gold/deep-red theme — for example, a bright emerald green, royal blue, or vibrant accent not currently used on the page. Ensure the button retains readable text, appropriate hover/focus states, and remains visually consistent with the overall warm traditional design language.

new_feature_requests.summary: Home page with hero section, photo gallery, and news section
Admission form page with candidate details and photo upload
Admin panel with Internet Identity authentication to manage submissions, gallery, and news
Store all admission form submissions in the backend database, including candidate details and uploaded photo
Super admin initialization - automatically register first logged-in user as permanent super admin
Admin management interface - view, add, and remove admin users (super admin only)
Admin reset functionality - reset admin system and re-initialize super admin
Backend authorization checks - verify admin status before granting access to admin features
Create backend functions to initialize the first authenticated user as the permanent super admin by capturing and storing their Internet Identity principal
Implement backend functions to manage a list of admin principals, including adding new admins, removing admins (except super admin), and retrieving all current admins
Update backend authorization logic to check if a caller is either the super admin or in the admin list before granting access to admin-only functions
Create a backend function to reset the entire admin system by clearing all admins and re-initializing the super admin with the next caller who accesses the reset functionality
Reorganize admin panel with sidebar menu layout containing all admin options (Manage Admins, Manage Gallery, Manage News, View Submissions)
Fix photo upload authorization in admin panel gallery section to properly recognize super admin status
Make admission form publicly accessible without authentication (allow anonymous submissions)
Add 'Father's Name' field to admission form right after candidate's name field
Generate unique 10-character admission ID in format YYYY0-XXXXX (year + 5-digit serial number) for each submission
Display printable admission card with unique ID and candidate details immediately after form submission
Store unique admission ID with all submission data in backend and display in admin panel

Update the backend admission form submission function to allow anonymous (unauthenticated) users to submit admission forms by removing the authorization check that currently blocks anonymous submissions
Add a 'fatherName' text field to the Candidate record type in the backend, positioned after the 'fullName' field in the data structure

Implement backend logic to generate a unique 10-character admission ID for each submission in the format YYYY0-XXXXX, where YYYY is the current year, 0 is a separator digit, and XXXXX is a zero-padded 5-digit sequential serial number that increments with each submission
Remove the authorization check from the backend submitAdmission function so anonymous users can submit admission forms without authentication
Replace all instances of 'Karani Sena Yuva Shakti' with Devanagari script 'करणी सेना युवा शक्ति' throughout the website
Replace the current hero section logo with the uploaded circular emblem (IMG-20260121-WA0003.jpg) featuring 'करणी सेना युवा शक्ति' text, deity portraits, crossed swords, and sunrise symbol
Replace hero section logo with circular emblem image (no white background version) featuring 'करणी सेना युवा शक्ति' text, deity portraits, crossed swords, and sunrise symbol

Convert all public-facing UI text to Hindi (home page, navigation, admission form, buttons, labels, error messages); keep admin panel in English; admission card labels in Hindi (नाम, पिता का नाम, जन्म तिथि, मोबाइल नंबर, प्रवेश आईडी, पता, जमा करने की तारीख)

Redesign AdmissionCard component as a physical ID card size (~85×54mm / credit card size) with organization branding (saffron/gold theme, logo), showing unique ID, name, father's name, mobile number, DOB, and candidate photo in a compact wallet card layout optimized for printing
Highlight the 'प्रवेश के लिए आवेदन करें' button on the home page with a distinct/contrasting color to make it more visually prominent
